it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.Model

  • public class Model
extends Observable
    This class is the core of the Model, it generates all of the needed class for the application to work properly
    Author:
    Federico Ferri, Alessio Fiorentino, Simone Francavilla

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static Model instance()
        This method return the instance of the singleton Model.
        Returns:
        a Model reference to the singleton.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String username,
                      LocalModelInterface localModel)
               throws MaxNumPlayersException
        This method is used to add a player in a specific array 'players'. Afterward is added a new LocalModel specific for the player that is just added.
        Parameters:
        username - is the player's name to be added.
        localModel - is the reference to the LocalModel class.
        Throws:
        MaxNumPlayersException

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(int i)
        This method is used to remove a specific player, passing his number.
        Parameters:
        i - is the number of the player to be removed.

      • reinsertPlayer

        public void reinsertPlayer(int i,
                           LocalModelInterface localModel)
        This method is used to reinsert in the match a player that has leaved just for a while.
        Parameters:
        i - is the number of the player to be reinserted.
        localModel - is the reference to the player's LocalModel instance.

      • updateTurn

        public void updateTurn()
                throws InvalidTurnException
        This method updates the turn.
        Throws:
        InvalidTurnException

      • getRound

        public int getRound()
        This method return the current round's number
        Returns:
        an integer value representing the round.

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        This method return the current turn's number
        Returns:
        an integer value representing the turn.

      • isBackward

        public boolean isBackward()
        This method is used to query if the turning flow is backward.
        Returns:
        a boolean value, true if is backward.

      • getDraftPoolDie

        public Die getDraftPoolDie(int pos)
        This method gives a specific die from the draftPool
        Parameters:
        pos - is the value representing the position in the DraftPool.
        Returns:
        a Die instance, more precisely a reference to the die in the DraftPool.

      • rollDraftPool

        public void rollDraftPool()
        This method is used to rool every die into the DraftPool.

      • addDraftPoolDie

        public void addDraftPoolDie(Die die)
        This method is used to add a die instance into the draftPool, that is passed to the method itself.
        Parameters:
        die - a Die instance of the die to be inserted in the DraftPool

      • removeDraftPoolDie

        public void removeDraftPoolDie(int pos)
        This method is used to remove a die (of a given position) from the DraftPool.
        Parameters:
        pos - is an integer representing the die to be removed.

      • getRoundTrackDie

        public Die getRoundTrackDie(int round,
                            int i)
        This method provides a specific die from the RoundTrack.
        Parameters:
        round - an integer value representing the round in which the die is been used.
        i - an integer that represent the row value to find the die from the RoundTrack.
        Returns:
        a Die reference to the die wanted.

      • getRTDieRound

        public int getRTDieRound(int round)
        This method provides the number of dice inserted in a Round-Track's round.
        Parameters:
        round - is a round value.
        Returns:
        the number of dice in the Round-Track relatively to the specific round.

      • addRoundTrackDie

        public void addRoundTrackDie(Die die,
                             int round)
        This method is used to add a new die in the RoundTrack.
        Parameters:
        die - The Die instance to be added.
        round - is the round in which is used and so the column of the matrix representing the RoundTrack.

      • removeRoundTrackDie

        public void removeRoundTrackDie(int round,
                                int i)
        This method is used to remove a die from the RoundTrack.
        Parameters:
        round - an integer value representing the round in which the die is been used.
        i - an integer that represent the value to find the die from the RoundTrack.
